channel.title: How do i remove effects in chat over head?
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/250kvuq.jpg[/img] Basically the chat above my head does this for me
Glow3:Wave2:
Any idea on how to fix this?
This is a delta based server
Somebody told me it was in client.java, i couldn't find any leads for it.
